channel.title: DJ Jonny Wilkinson Presents...
channel.description:
From Funky House to Dance, Drum N Bass to Hip Hop sets. You'll find a mix that'll massage your ears, get you bobbing and revelling in the diversity of some of the coolest tracks out there!
You can download my latest mixes at http://djjonnywilkinson.mypodcast.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: A Pick 'N' Mix Selection from a UK DJ...
channel.itunes:author: DJ Jonny Wilkinson
channel.itunes:summary:
From Funky House to Dance, Drum N Bass to Hip Hop sets. You'll find a mix that'll massage your ears, get you bobbing and revelling in the diversity of some of the coolest tracks out there!
You can download my latest mixes at http://djjonnywilkinson.mypodcast.com

item.title: Drum'N'Bassmeantforboogying!!
item.description: Does what it says on the tin! If not....someone switched the labels! Enjoy people.
item.dc:creator: DJ Jonny Wilkinson
item.itunes:summary:
Does what it says on the tin!
If not....someone switched the labels!
Enjoy people.

item.title: Quick midnight mix...
item.description: This quick one should get you into the spirit of 2011. A bit of a laugh this one....includes some Girls Aloud! 'What!!' you may say...well have a listen.... All the best for the new year. DJ Jonny W x
item.dc:creator: DJ Jonny Wilkinson
item.itunes:summary:
This quick one should get you into the spirit of 2011.
A bit of a laugh this one....includes some Girls Aloud! 'What!!' you may say...well have a listen....
All the best for the new year.
DJ Jonny W x

item.title: Summer Festival Mix 2008
item.description: It's been a while!! Here's the latest releases to sit in the sun and bounce your feet to.....this mix emphasizes the latin theme. Enjoy!......... 1) Guaglione 2008 - Cisko Brothers 2) 3rd Movement - Soundstream 3) Rhythm Is Our Business - Ross Couch 4) Latino Activo - Jessie Garcia 5) Lanzarote - Jessie Garcia 6) Bora Bora - Juan Magan 7) Been A Long Time (Ortega Mix) - Nicola Fasano Vs. Yoshimoto 8) Flashback - jay C And Felix Baumgartner 9) Maria - Riva Starr 10) Where's Your Head At (CJ Stone Mix) - Jean Elan 11) Fiesta Elektronika - Outwerk 12) Move Your Body (Jessie Garcia Mix) - The Grower 13) Wear My Rolex (Extended Mix) - Wiley 14) Serenity - Serenity Ft. Mark Evans - Studio Apartment 15) Alright Tonight - Silvano Da Silva This Mix was made by DJ Jonny Wilkinson using the Tonium Pacemaker! www.pacemaker.net

item.title: March Mix 2008
item.description: The latest releases and pre-releases to get you going....spring is in the air!! All done using the new Tonium Pacemaker!!! www.pacemaker.net 1) Blessed - Dervish Mike and Inya Day 2) Big Money Comin' - Crookers 3) Bite The Pill - Hoxton Whores 4) Brazil Street - White abel 5) Enfant Terrible - Sonny J 6) Fools Gold 2008 - Plasticlife 7) Giving All My Love - Starjackers 8) Gonna Be Mine - Addictive Ft. T2 9) House Music - Riva Starr 10) I Know You Want My Thing - Riva Starr 11) Jack My Bell - Riva Starr 12) Knobbers - Sonny J 13) Something Good 2008 - Utah Saints 14) Una Noche Mas - Alex Dias Ft Josh Love 15) Why Did Ya - Beat Thiefs 16) Superstar Breaks - Elaktro F

item.title: Electric D&B Mix - January 008
item.description: A Drum and Bass Mix featuring the latest release tracks. Includes the massive drum and bass remix of Axwell’s corker…I found U. All massive, all unusual, all guaranteed top ear fodder....enjoy! 1) On The Run - Shy FX Ft. David Boomah 2) Rock The Boat - Shy FX and T Power 3) Drum N' Bossa - Carbuncle 4) Ganja Fire - Visionary 5) Soulsearchin' - Young Ax 6) Delta VIP - T Power 7) Flirt - Consta 8) Skills - Danny C 9) Lovers Rock - Shy FX and T Power 10) Don't Rush It - Break 11) Uprock - Logistics 12) Twin Peaks - Child Support 13) Bad Habit - Ego Trippin 14) I've Been Stalking you On My Space - John B 15) Panda Style - L.E.O 16) Everything's Different - High Contrast 17) Aiance Amen - Atlantic Connection 18) I Found U (High Contrast Old School Revenge Mix) - Axwell Equipment used - Numark...iDJ2
item.dc:creator: DJ Jonny Wilkinson
item.itunes:summary:
A Drum and Bass Mix featuring the latest release tracks. Includes the massive drum and bass remix of Axwell’s corker…I found U. All massive, all unusual, all guaranteed top ear fodder....enjoy!

David Boomah 2) Rock The Boat - Shy FX and T Power 3) Drum N' Bossa - Carbuncle 4) Ganja Fire - Visionary 5) Soulsearchin' - Young Ax 6) Delta VIP - T Power 7) Flirt - Consta 8) Skills - Danny C 9) Lovers Rock - Shy FX and T Power 10) Don't Rush It - Break 11) Uprock - Logistics 12) Twin Peaks - Child Support 13) Bad Habit - Ego Trippin 14) I've Been Stalking you On My Space - John B 15) Panda Style - L.E.O 16) Everything's Different - High Contrast 17) Aiance Amen - Atlantic Connection 18) I Found U (High Contrast Old School Revenge Mix) - Axwell

item.title: The End of 2007
item.description: Yup...the title sounds a bit Nostradamus!! Some of the latest releases to take us into 2008...Happy New Year!! All done on the new iDJ2.....top notch piece of kit!! 1) Way We Go - Jukey 2) Funky Sound - Massirock 3) Give Me Love - Fresh 27 4) My Luv 4 U - Shroen Matynas 5) Trippin On You - Cahill 6) Alive - Oliver Backens & Stephan Gruenwold 7) Fuck Me - Noir Presents Black Magic 8) Acid House Music - Deepgroove 9) I Love What You Do - Nik Denton Presents Pip & Pen feat. Tonnic 10) Clean The Closet - Dekky 11) Feel I'm Falling - Bit Lolitas & Raz Nitzan ft Jennifer Horne 12) Uninvited - Freemasons 13) Carry Me Away - Chris Lake Ft. Emma Hewitt

item.title: 99 with a flake!?
item.description: Get a load of this I dug out of the archives. Classics from 99-2000! Enjoy folks. DJ Jonny.
item.dc:creator: DJ Jonny Wilkinson
item.itunes:summary:
Get a load of this I dug out of the archives.
Classics from 99-2000!
Enjoy folks.
DJ Jonny.

item.title: Breaks the Scene!!
item.description: A mix of massive breaks tracks with emphasis on phat bass lines and melodic grooves. Listen out for the Krafty Kuts numbers and the huge Vitalian House by Phil Kieran! Also visit... www.myspace.com/wilkinsonjonny 1) The Funk Is In Your Area - Krafty Kuts 2) Play (Ft. Noah Deep) - Redlight 3) Dead Drummers - The Rogue Element 4) Vitalian House - Phil Kieran 5) Sweet Dreams (DJ Infinity Mix) - Euryhthmics 6) Bass Phenomenon - Krafty Kuts 7) Thrill Me (Plump DJ Mix) - Junior Jack 8) Flamenco Freddie - Krafty Kuts 9) Body Language - Mandy Vs. Booka Shade 10) Smoke Machine - X-Press 2 11) Don't Stop - Krafty Kuts 12) 2 Men On A Trip - Meat Katie & Lee Coombs 13) Millenium - A.M.P 14) Apollo (General Midi Mix) - Way Out West

item.title: The Man with the Child in his Eyes (DJ Jonny Wilkinson Remix) - Kate Bush
item.description: I just had to remix this wonderful track and have attempted to preserve the essence of the original track to it's full. I remember this as a kid and still play the original today. I hope you enjoy it and please let me know what you think. Best Wishes...JW
item.dc:creator: DJ Jonny Wilkinson
item.itunes:summary: I just had to remix this wonderful track and have attempted to preserve the essence of the original track to it's full. I remember this as a kid and still play the original today. I hope you enjoy it and please let me know what you think. Best Wishes...JW

item.title: DJ Jonny Presents...Drum N Bass In Yer Face Mix!
item.description: The latest D&B grooves to get you movin'...if it doesn't...check your pulse! Best wishes as ever and enjoy...JW. 1) The Chopper - Ray Keith 2) Hype The Funk - 2 Vibe 3) Raining Blood - Concord Dawn 4) Winding Down - Chino 5) Stagger - Mindscape 7) Smile (Soundboy Mix) - Lily Allen 8) My MTV (Screamheads Remix) - Noir 9) The Plague - Hue and Keaton 10) Altered Soul - FX 909 11) Timeless - Radar 12) Bodyrock - Andy C and Shimon 13) Passing Me By - Aphrodite 14) RS2000 - EZ Rollers 15) Burning Up - Peshay 16) Spaced Inveder - Hatrias Vs. J Majik 17) Tomahawk - Straw Dogs

item.title: DJ Jonny Presents...Clifton's Kebab Store - A Night Out Mix
item.description: Wack this on, turn up the bass and get ready to go out. Or, you could just wack it on when you get in...whilst chomping that kebab!
item.dc:creator: DJ Jonny Wilkinson
item.itunes:summary: Wack this on, turn up the bass and get ready to go out. Or, you could just wack it on when you get in...whilst chomping that kebab!

item.title: Jonny's Laid Back Hip Hop II
item.description: Loads of our own great British Hip Hop artists all put together in the mix here. From DJ Format to RDJ2...this blend of cool street and lounge beats should tickle all you B' boys and B' girls out there! Download it now..put your feet up and chill out.....
item.dc:creator: DJ Jonny Wilkinson
item.itunes:summary: Loads of our own great British Hip Hop artists all put together in the mix here. From DJ Format to RDJ2...this blend of cool street and lounge beats should tickle all you B' boys and B' girls out there! Download it now..put your feet up and chill out.....

item.title: Trance 1999
item.description: 1999 brought us some classic trance anthems. Here are some of the more underground classics that were being played out in clubs nationwide. From the beautiful, 'Under the Water' by Mother Brown to 'Music ic the Key' by Westbam and Dr Motte...hopefully, you'll feel like you've gone back in time...
item.dc:creator: DJ Jonny Wilkinson
item.itunes:summary: 1999 brought us some classic trance anthems. Here are some of the more underground classics that were being played out in clubs nationwide. From the beautiful, 'Under the Water' by Mother Brown to 'Music ic the Key' by Westbam and Dr Motte...hopefully, you'll feel like you've gone back in time...

item.title: DJ Jonny Presents...Work Up To Christmas Mix
item.description:
Been good?...Santa might just pop down your chimney then! This mix comprises the latest tracks to take you swiftly into 2007. It has to be said...2006 was a good year.....
1) Something Inside - Kris Kaeser Ft. Rita Campbell 2) Much Better - Danni P 3) Another Chance (Sound Of Eden Mix) - pH 38 4) You Never Know - Patrik Le Funk 5) Make It On Your Own - Jon Silve 6) Happiness 2006 - Sound De-ZIgn 7) Don't Keep Me Hanging On - Emanon 8) Discopolis (Chris Lake Mix) - Lifelike And Menace 9) Feel Alive - Noir 10) House Anthem Back - World Champions 11) Magic Fett - Unconditional 12) You Spin Me Right Round - Nali Milani 13) Pack Up ANd Dance - Andy Kato 14) Deeper Love - Eddie Thoneick Ft Berget Lewis

item.title: DJ Jonny's Laid Back Hip Hop Mix
item.description: To all you laid back, cool types out there...relax...put your feet up. Wack on this mellow mix of hip hop and cool lounge tracks. You'll find everything from Manchester's Grand Central label artists to the Trinidad Steel Drum Band! Put together in 2004....before you know it you'll be sporting an afro and baggy pants! ENJOY.
item.dc:creator: DJ Jonny Wilkinson
item.itunes:summary: To all you laid back, cool types out there...relax...put your feet up. Wack on this mellow mix of hip hop and cool lounge tracks. You'll find everything from Manchester's Grand Central label artists to the Trinidad Steel Drum Band! Put together in 2004....before you know it you'll be sporting an afro and baggy pants! ENJOY.

item.title: Jonny's Hard House Mix
item.description: A selection of higher BPM, racey house / Dance tracks I put together earlier in 2006. This selection of harder, livelier house tracks takes influence from the sets of Carl Cox, Bad Boy Bill and DJ Icey. Turn it up!
item.dc:creator: DJ Jonny Wilkinson
item.itunes:summary: A selection of higher BPM, racey house / Dance tracks I put together earlier in 2006. This selection of harder, livelier house tracks takes influence from the sets of Carl Cox, Bad Boy Bill and DJ Icey. Turn it up!

item.title: Club Beats In The Mix 2007
item.description:
The latest releases and not yet released tunes put together for your enjoyment...check out the nutty 'Cilit Bang' track at the end!
1) Proper Education - Eric Prydz 2) Turn Me On (Denace The Menace Mix) - Dirty Old Ann 3) Not Over Yet (Wawa Mix) - Carnival 4) Wrapped ARound Your Finger - Moon's Flag 5) Kickin In The Beat (Bentley Club Mix) - Funkin DJ's Ft. Pam Fernandez 6) Crazy (Soulseekerz Blitz Mix) - Elektrik DJ 7) Open Your Eyes - M Factor 8) Lovin' You Is Killing Me - Moment Of Truth 9) Party All The Time (Cedric Gervais Remix) - Sharam 10) In My Mind (Acapella) - Parl's Avenue 11) In My Mind (Simmons And Christopher Dub) - David Kane 12) Club Sound (Krafft Remix) - David Kane 13) Look At Something (Starchaser Remix) - Tidestar 14) Exceeder (Matijn Ten Velden Mix) - Mason 15) Cilit Bang (Christian Hoff Vocal Remix) - Jazakid Ft. Barry Scott
